description: Satou Kazuma is a game-obsessed shut-in Japanese teenager. He is sent to the parallel reality after dying from acute stress reaction, forcing http://anidb.net/ch78019 [Aqua] to come with him after she irritates him with her attitude. On becoming an adventurer, Kazuma joins the Adventurer class, which, despite being ranked the lowest, allows him to learn various skills from other classes, albeit at an increased cost. With his ability, Kazuma learns basic skills such as stealing, archery, monster detection, and basic magic.
name: Satou Kazuma
